content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-47.5, -123.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at Position (-47.5, -123.5)
- Pipe at Position (-47.5, -122.5)
- Boiler at Position (-46.5, -119.0)
- Steam Engine at Position (-40.5, -113.5)
- Small Electric Pole at Position (-44.5, -119.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-15.0, -76.0) and Wooden Chest at Position (-15.5, -77.5)
- Stone Furnace at Position (-19.0, -73.0)

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at Position (9.0, -64.0)
- Stone Furnace at Position (6.0, -62.0)
- Inserter at Position (6.5, -60.5) connected to Small Electric Pole at Position (5.5, -60.5) and Wooden Chest at Position (7.5, -61.5)
- Wooden Chest at Position (6.5, -59.5)

### Miscellaneous
- Wooden Chest at Position (7.5, -61.5) storing iron plates
- Lab with no power

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors When Placing Pipes
- Ensure there is no obstruction at the target location before attempting to place a pipe. Remove any existing entities that may be in the way.

### Boiler Not Receiving Water
- Verify that all pipes are correctly connected from the offshore pump to the boiler to ensure water flow. Check for any disconnected segments in the piping system.

### Steam Engine Not Connected to Power Network
- Connect the steam engine to the power network using electric poles to ensure it can distribute generated power.

### Inserter Not Receiving Electricity
- Ensure that the inserter is connected to a powered electric pole. Check the power network for any disconnections or lack of power supply.
